title: Want to buy a group of graded T206 cards
author: Cy2009

posts.post_title: Want to buy a group of graded T206 cards
posts.post_content:
Hi,

I am looking to buy a group of graded T206 cards. I would prefer a larger group, but would entertain thoughts on a smaller group. I would accept PSA or SGC cards in the 3-4-5 range, 2's are OK if they present well.

I am willing to pay a fair price, but not retail for a group.

Send me what you have with a price to [url]cyrilp@visuallink.com[/url].

Thanks.

Cy
